name: Trainz Driver 2016
summary:
Explore hundreds of miles of realistic rail networks as Driver or Operator controlling 30 different locomotives across 4 enormous routes including the full 393-mile London-Edinburgh Mainline. 
 
Trainz Driver 2016 is an opportunity to explore the world of Trainz: A New Era utilizing all the same Routes and Sessions as the "full TANE version" at a fraction of the price.
